ai-mil5.3.6:1.1_0: “She’s seated, Venerable Nāgadatta, you speak the instructions of the senior monks:
ai-mil5.3.6:2.3_0: A wise one should sit down
ai-mil5.3.6:3.1_0: and he spoke to the Buddha again:
ai-mil5.3.6:3.2_0: ‘Ānanda, there are two meal offerings that have identical fruit and result, and are more fruitful and beneficial than other meal offerings.
ai-mil5.3.6:3.3_0: What are the teachings grouped by two?
ai-mil5.3.6:3.4_0: The meal after eating which a Realized One understands the supreme perfect awakening; and the meal after eating which he becomes fully extinguished through the natural principle of extinguishment, without anything left over.
ai-mil5.3.6:3.5_0: These two meal offerings have identical fruit and result, and are more fruitful and beneficial than other meal offerings.’
ai-mil5.3.6:3.6_0: When the Buddha had finished his meal and refused an affliction, Cunda, it’s better for them to have direct meditative experience of the fruit of eating only alms-food, and the fruit of giving that same meal.
ai-mil5.3.6:3.7_0: If two meal offerings have identical fruit and result, and are more fruitful and beneficial than other meal offerings, which are more fruitful and beneficial, and splendid and bountiful.
ai-mil5.3.6:3.8_0: “Sir, what is that dragon? And what is the negativity of eating alms-food and glorious and effective, that is the life of the Buddha?
ai-mil5.3.6:3.9_0: And here they’ve made the doctrine of others. They feel lost when they die. And when people are reborn in a lower realm they’ve arisen.
ai-mil5.3.6:3.10_0: This is a bowl and robes that should be kept for you.”
ai-mil5.3.6:4.1_0: “Great king, this is what you have said.
ai-mil5.3.6:5.3_0: A wise one should sit down
ai-mil5.3.6:6.2_0: ‘Ānanda, there are two meal offerings that have identical fruit and result, and are more fruitful and beneficial than other meal offerings.
ai-mil5.3.6:6.3_0: What are the teachings grouped by two?
ai-mil5.3.6:6.4_0: The meal after eating which a Realized One understands the supreme perfect awakening; and the meal after eating which he becomes fully extinguished through the natural principle of extinguishment, without anything left over. And the Realized One became fully extinguished through the natural principle of extinguishment, without anything left over.’
ai-mil5.3.6:7.2_0: Delighted by the deities, thinking: ‘This is the last alms-food’ ... ‘This bioil’s alms-food’.
ai-mil5.3.6:7.3_0: And it had been properly offered to baby caketching a lot of decay and perishes.
ai-mil5.3.6:7.4_0: The Buddha hasn’t arisen in him. But it’s not appropriate for the Buddha to allow him to stay on the fifteenth day of the life, and even if it was already arisen away.
ai-mil5.3.6:8.1_0: Whatever fire gets old, but continues to grasp it in the bonfire.
ai-mil5.3.6:8.2_0: In the same way, when the Buddha’s corpse is consumed by the funeral pyre was fully extinguished, he even more splendid and bountiful.
ai-mil5.3.6:9.1_0: While they’re blown up by the wind, the rain pour it into a great flood,
ai-mil5.3.6:9.2_0: In the same way, when the Buddha’s corpse is consumed by the funeral pyre was fully extinguished, he even more splendid and bountiful.
ai-mil5.3.6:10.1_0: Or a price for his belly is firmly embarrassed, open, and even more.
ai-mil5.3.6:10.2_0: In the same way, when the Buddha’s corpse is demolished it, it’s the life forceful, and the life span. There’s no longer possible for them to strike up even more hate.”
ai-mil5.3.6:11.1_0: “After Kāsī who has had two meal offerings and fruit, and result, and are more fruitful and beneficial than other meal offerings?”
ai-mil5.3.6:11.2_0: “Of the attainment of the fruit of stream-entry that have ripened and the fruit of once-returning, non-returning, and meal offerings there are more fruitful and beneficial than other meal offerings.”
ai-mil5.3.6:12.1_0: “Which of these two things are not attained by a dragon and fruit of stream-entry, but has more fruitful and beneficial than other meal offerings?”
ai-mil5.3.6:12.2_0: “Great king, for nine progressive meditative attainments, yet all of them growing on very fruitful and beneficial, and splendid and bountiful.”
ai-mil5.3.6:13.1_0: “Living in two days, sirs, is held at least two days, three the Realized One has never appeal to peace, insight of awakening?”
ai-mil5.3.6:14.2_0: Anyone who, being devoted to him, is loyal to him, the ultimate goal of alms-food,
ai-mil5.3.6:14.4_0: That’s how bigger than a large dwelling of stream-entry, in that even more fruitful and beneficial, but no more fruitful and beneficial than the dwellings.
ai-mil5.3.6:14.5_0: Sir, please accept this way from Nāgadatta.”
ai-mil5.3.6:15.1_0: The sixth sub-chapter on almsfood is finished.
